title: BOC user can reversing a declare free agent transaction to un-expire any contracts that were expired as a result of the transaction being approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a approved declare free agent tx
custom_expected:
THEN it will "unexpire" any minor contract that was marked Expired as a result of the approval of the transaction.
AND The state of the minor league contract will be returned to its previous state.

title: BOC user reversing a release transaction to un-terminate any minor league contracts that were terminated as a result of the release being approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an approved release tx
custom_expected:
THEN it will "unterminate" any minor contract that was marked Terminated as a result of the approval of the transaction. 
AND The state of the minor league contract will be returned to its previous state.

title: BOC Reversing Release tx un-terminates MNC
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has an approved release tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user reverses the tx
custom_expected:
THEN MNC will unterminate
AND status will be returned to its previous state

title: BOC reversing Free Agent tx un-expires MNC
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an Approved FA tx w/an expired MNC
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks reverse on tx
custom_expected:
THEN MNC will unexpire
AND The state of the minor league contract will be returned to its previous state.
